description: This file serves as a placeholder API client for notes management, intended for future backend integration. It defines functions for URL configuration and CRUD operations, though actual implementations are not provided yet, with error throws indicating unimplemented methods.

methods.name: getApiBaseUrl()
methods.description: Returns the configured API base URL from environment variables for future use.

methods.name: fetchNotes()
methods.description: Placeholder for retrieving notes from backend; currently throws an error indicating not implemented.

methods.name: createNoteApi()
methods.description: Placeholder for creating a note in backend; currently throws an error indicating not implemented.

methods.name: updateNoteApi()
methods.description: Placeholder for updating a note in backend; currently throws an error indicating not implemented.

methods.name: deleteNoteApi()
methods.description: Placeholder for deleting a note in backend; currently throws an error indicating not implemented.
